subject: Problem with clutch
description_text:
Hi,

I have noticed my clutch looks like it is cracking.


Is that something I need to be worried about?

Thanks,
Lukas Jarmara

conversations.body_text: Hi Lukáš Jarmara,  I cannot clearly see the exact location of the crack in the photo. Could you please take a clearer picture and indicate the problem area?

Hi,
Here is a better photo.

Best,
Lukas

On Wed 19. 11. 2025 at 4:25, service@simsonn.com
Hi Lukáš Jarmara,     Is this the part with the crack? We will send you a replacement part.

Hi,

yes, that is the part.

Thanks,
Lukas Jarmara

On Sat 22. 11. 2025 at 4:48, service@simsonn.com
Hi Lukáš Jarmara,  Please provide your order number, contact name, phone number, and address, and we will send you a replacement part.

Hi,
here it is:

Order #SSN3142
Name: Lukas Jarmara
Phone Number: +420 605 245 103
Address: V Zámcích 315/18, Praha 8, Bohnice, 181 00

In case anything else is needed, let me know.

Thank you,
Lukas Jarmara

po 24. 11. 2025 v 9:58 odesílatel service@simsonn.com
Hi Lukáš Jarmara,    We apologize for the delayed response. We will arrange for a replacement to be sent to you as soon as possible.
